dbQuery.name: summaryInventoryQty
dbQuery.query: select count(*) from v_recon_inventory_queue with ur

dbQuery.name: summaryInventoryCustomerQty
dbQuery.query: select count(distinct customer_id) from v_recon_inventory_queue with ur

dbQuery.name: summaryLicensingQty
dbQuery.query: select count(*) from v_recon_licensing_queue with ur

dbQuery.name: summaryLicensingCustomerQty
dbQuery.query: select count(distinct customer_id) from v_recon_licensing_queue with ur

dbQuery.name: specialAccounts
dbQuery.query: select c.customer_id, c.account_number, c.customer_name, date(record_time), count(*) from v_recon_queue v, customer c where v.customer_id = c.customer_id and v.customer_id in (12476,9754) group by c.customer_id, c.account_number,c.customer_name,date(v.record_time) order by date(v.record_time) fetch first 50 rows only with ur

dbQuery.name: p1FullVolumn
dbQuery.query: select v.table, count(*) from v_recon_queue v where v.customer_id in (12476,9754) group by v.table with ur

dbQuery.name: queryP21
dbQuery.query: select count(distinct v.customer_id) from v_recon_queue v, customer c where v.customer_id = c.customer_id and c.customer_type_id not in(172, 173, 222, 224, 217) and c.customer_id != 999999 with ur

dbQuery.name: queryP22
dbQuery.query: select count(*) from v_recon_queue v, customer c where v.customer_id = c.customer_id and c.customer_type_id not in(172, 173, 222, 224, 217) and c.customer_id != 999999 with ur

dbQuery.name: queryP23
dbQuery.query: select c.customer_id, c.account_number, c.customer_name, date(record_time), count(*) from v_recon_queue v, customer c where v.customer_id = c.customer_id and c.customer_type_id not in(172, 173, 222, 224, 217) and c.customer_id !=999999 group by c.customer_id, c.account_number, c.customer_name, date(record_time) order by date(v.record_time) fetch first 10 rows only with ur

dbQuery.name: queryP24
dbQuery.query: select v.table, count(*) from v_recon_queue v,customer c where v.customer_id = c.customer_id and c.customer_type_id not in (172,173, 222, 224, 217) and c.customer_id != 999999 group by v.table with ur

dbQuery.name: queryP31
dbQuery.query: select count(distinct v.customer_id) from v_recon_queue v, customer c where v.customer_id = c.customer_id and c.customer_type_id in (172, 173, 222, 224, 217) with ur

dbQuery.name: queryP32
dbQuery.query: select count(*) from v_recon_queue v, customer c where v.customer_id = c.customer_id and c.customer_type_id in(172, 173, 222, 224, 217) with ur

dbQuery.name: queryP33
dbQuery.query: select c.customer_id, c.account_number,c.customer_name, date(record_time), count(*) from v_recon_queue v, customer c where v.customer_id = c.customer_id and c.customer_type_id in (172, 173, 222, 224, 217) group by c.customer_id, c.account_number, c.customer_name, date(record_time) order by date(v.record_time) fetch first 10 rows only with ur

dbQuery.name: queryP34
dbQuery.query: select v.table, count(*) from v_recon_queue v,customer c where v.customer_id = c.customer_id and c.customer_type_id in (172, 173, 222, 224, 217) group by v.table with ur

dbQuery.name: queryP44
dbQuery.query: select c.customer_name, ris.action, count(*) from RECON_INSTALLED_SW ris, customer c where ris.customer_id = c.customer_id and c.customer_type_id in (172, 173, 222, 224, 217) group by c.customer_name, ris.action order by c.customer_name, ris.action desc fetch first 10 rows only with ur

dbQuery.name: query41
dbQuery.query: select count(*) from v_recon_queue where customer_id = 999999 with ur

dbQuery.name: query42
dbQuery.query: select v.table,count(*) from v_recon_queue v where customer_id = 999999 group by v.table with ur

dbQuery.name: query61
dbQuery.query: select count(*) from software_lpar a left outer join software_lpar_map b on a.id = b.software_lpar_id left outer join scan_record c on b.scan_record_id = c.id where a.action != 'COMPLETE' or b.action != 'COMPLETE' with ur

dbQuery.name: query62
dbQuery.query: select count(distinct a.customer_id) from software_lpar a left outer join software_lpar_map b on a.id = b.software_lpar_id left outer join scan_record c on b.scan_record_id = c.id where a.action != 'COMPLETE' or b.action != 'COMPLETE' with ur

dbQuery.name: queryCustomerCache
dbQuery.query: select customer_id, customer_name, account_number from customer with ur
